attributes.action: change the policy in the housing act of successions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the primeminster to change the succession rights to go more times for the family members, from the parents to the children then possibly grand children rather than kicking them out on the street especially if thay are stll paying their rent etc...also especially for disabled people who are also settled in the family homes and to save local authorities time and money in rehousing them etc...
